column4: how can I unrar and see the progress of the extraction ie., % completed, time remaining, etc ??
open a terminal, cd to the directory your RAR files are in, then use the command 'unrar x filename.rar'
if you right-click the RAR and choose to extract, I *think* it will show a progress bar, but it's been a very long time since I've done that so I'm not 100% sure
guess the command line way is the only way to get a progress reading then
